blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: I saw the post you just reblogged wonder what exactly you are suggesting about the issues being discussed on IDB?
question: I saw the post you just reblogged wonder what exactly you are suggesting about the issues being discussed on IDB?
answer: This seems very baiting. I don’t know what’s going on on IDB and, frankly, I don’t give a damn. My only concern these days is the fate of Ghost in Game of Thrones. I reblogged @dramaphan because it annoys me to no end that some people can’t understand that some of us just happen to like Dan and/or Phil’s content and couldn’t care less who they date. I know, it’s shocking, when something is none of my business, I respect basic boundaries that any kindergartener is taught and don’t try to pry into people’s personal matters. Just a crazy thought: maybe people hate IDB because any time they say something even remotely critical of the message board they get annoying anons trying to defend its honor, but the users there spend all day saying all manner of gross things about Dan and Phil, who some of us actually like for reasons other than fetishizing them.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: reddit(.)com/r/AskReddit/comments/bjkzua/what_youtubers_did_you_use_to_watch_religiously/em9kz61/ Have you seen this? It’s...
question: reddit(.)com/r/AskReddit/comments/bjkzua/what_youtubers_did_you_use_to_watch_religiously/em9kz61/ Have you seen this? It’s pretty high up on reddit for YouTubers people used to like but don’t like anymore. Thoughts?
answer: This is interesting. I only glanced quickly, but I see a lot I agree with. I usually agree with people who were former fans of Dan and Phil that have outgrown them or no longer like their content for other reasons. I still happen to like Dan and think a few of the videos he made in the last couple of years were really good, but I do think that around the time of TATINOF/TABINOF, when “Dan and Phil” became the main brand, they started to get a lot more commercial and target a younger audience more aggressively and I do think overall the content suffered (over time) because of it. It does always make me sad when I read these things though and see people say how much the phandom turns them off to Dan and Phil. The phandom has never seemed to grasp the concept (or purposely ignores it) that some of their behavior really holds Dan and Phil back in multiple ways.

I still happen to like Dan and think a few of the videos he made in the last couple of years were really good, but I do think that around the time of TATINOF/TABINOF, when “Dan and Phil” became the main brand, they started to get a lot more commercial and target a younger audience more aggressively and I do think overall the content suffered (over time) because of it. It does always make me sad when I read these things though and see people say how much the phandom turns them off to Dan and Phil. The phandom has never seemed to grasp the concept (or purposely ignores it) that some of their behavior really holds Dan and Phil back in multiple ways.

I usually agree with people who were former fans of Dan and Phil that have outgrown them or no longer like their content for other reasons. I still happen to like Dan and think a few of the videos he made in the last couple of years were really good, but I do think that around the time of TATINOF/TABINOF, when “Dan and Phil” became the main brand, they started to get a lot more commercial and target a younger audience more aggressively and I do think overall the content suffered (over time) because of it. It does always make me sad when I read these things though and see people say how much the phandom turns them off to Dan and Phil. The phandom has never seemed to grasp the concept (or purposely ignores it) that some of their behavior really holds Dan and Phil back in multiple ways.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: First Kiss (4) Masterlist
title: First Kiss (4) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three

Come Undone - avatarin3d

Summary: Dan and Phil’s first night together.

Do You Believe In Magic? - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil live in a world where magic exists. They’ve grown up together in a same small town and have learned to hate each other. One day a ‘witch’ casts a spell on them to make them switch bodies with each other. They spell can’t be undone until they learn to get along.

First Kiss (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: Dan and Phil meet for the first time in real life, and ride the ferris wheel at sunset. Phil is afraid of heights, so Dan takes his hands, leading to their first sweet kiss.

Graveyard (ao3) - Numberonephanboy

Summary: “You’re bringing me lunch in a graveyard?”

“Sounded more romantic in my head.”

It’s Not A Date - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Dan and Phil were supposed to be hanging out with a group of friends, but when they all bail on them they decide to hang out with just each other but it’s not a date.

Luminescence - phloridas

Summary: Dan never expected Phil to seriously notice him. Sure, maybe he’d glance at his sign and laugh, but not even in his wildest dreams did he imagine actually getting called up onstage to do the one thing he’d dreamed of for years. But what happens when a simple kiss unexpectedly turns into something more? And what about Dan’s acting dreams, pushed aside so he can study law, but now once again taking center stage?

Paper Stars - botanistlester

Summary: Dan starts to get love notes in his locker in the form of origami stars, so he gets the help of his best friend, Phil, to figure out who it is.

Partners (ao3) - wingdingsphil

Summary: Dan and Phil, mutual enemies, are partnered for a term long project. They finish it in the first week, and discover they have way more in common than they thought.

Red letters and Love confessions - philbyte-fanfic

Summary: Dan has been writing letters to Phil for many years, so what happened when Phil comes across one.

Say you won’t let go (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: “I think I’m in love with you!”

“What?”

…..

I knew I loved you then, but you’d never know cause I played it cool when I was scared of letting go.

Shake It Out - howellesterfics

Summary: Phil has been pining after Dan (despite his affinity towards edgy fashion), but sometimes it feels like he doesn’t really know him at all. maybe all they need is a little liquid courage.

Tattoo Boy (ao3) - tahliaisnotonfire

Summary: Dan Howell couldn’t have been happier than to have met that beautifully tattooed boy on the street by running away from some idiotic bullies.

The Not So Impossible Quiz (ao3) - LittlePrincessA

Summary: Dan and Phil finally set out to finishing The Impossible Quiz game for the gaming channel, but is finishing the game the only thing at stake here?

The Only Thing I Know - avatarin3d

Summary: Dan’s young and (possibly) in love but Phil is scared of moving too fast.

Unraveling Expectations - auroraphilealis

Summary: Phil’s been flirting with Dan for months by the time he finally comes to visit Phil in Manchester, only Phil had insisted they not make anything official between them until they’d actually met in person. Phil had been hoping that would take the pressure off of them to do anything they’d talked about on Skype, only something seems to be off about Dan. Phil just wants Dan to be comfortable, no matter what that means.

You’re Beautiful - whiskersandquiff

Summary: Dan and Phil are meeting in person for the first time, and both are nervous as hell. They spend the day together and work through the nerves to find the start of something beautiful.

reblog.comment:

Summary: Dan and Phil’s first night together.

Do You Believe In Magic? - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil live in a world where magic exists. They’ve grown up together in a same small town and have learned to hate each other. One day a ‘witch’ casts a spell on them to make them switch bodies with each other. They spell can’t be undone until they learn to get along.

First Kiss (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: Dan and Phil meet for the first time in real life, and ride the ferris wheel at sunset. Phil is afraid of heights, so Dan takes his hands, leading to their first sweet kiss.

Graveyard (ao3) - Numberonephanboy

Summary: “You’re bringing me lunch in a graveyard?”

“Sounded more romantic in my head.”

It’s Not A Date - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Dan and Phil were supposed to be hanging out with a group of friends, but when they all bail on them they decide to hang out with just each other but it’s not a date.

Luminescence - phloridas

Summary: Dan never expected Phil to seriously notice him. Sure, maybe he’d glance at his sign and laugh, but not even in his wildest dreams did he imagine actually getting called up onstage to do the one thing he’d dreamed of for years. But what happens when a simple kiss unexpectedly turns into something more? And what about Dan’s acting dreams, pushed aside so he can study law, but now once again taking center stage?

Paper Stars - botanistlester

Summary: Dan starts to get love notes in his locker in the form of origami stars, so he gets the help of his best friend, Phil, to figure out who it is.

Partners (ao3) - wingdingsphil

Summary: Dan and Phil, mutual enemies, are partnered for a term long project. They finish it in the first week, and discover they have way more in common than they thought.

Red letters and Love confessions - philbyte-fanfic

Summary: Dan has been writing letters to Phil for many years, so what happened when Phil comes across one.

Say you won’t let go (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: “I think I’m in love with you!”

“What?”

…..

I knew I loved you then, but you’d never know cause I played it cool when I was scared of letting go.

Shake It Out - howellesterfics

Summary: Phil has been pining after Dan (despite his affinity towards edgy fashion), but sometimes it feels like he doesn’t really know him at all. maybe all they need is a little liquid courage.

Tattoo Boy (ao3) - tahliaisnotonfire

Summary: Dan Howell couldn’t have been happier than to have met that beautifully tattooed boy on the street by running away from some idiotic bullies.

The Not So Impossible Quiz (ao3) - LittlePrincessA

Summary: Dan and Phil finally set out to finishing The Impossible Quiz game for the gaming channel, but is finishing the game the only thing at stake here?

The Only Thing I Know - avatarin3d

Summary: Dan’s young and (possibly) in love but Phil is scared of moving too fast.

Unraveling Expectations - auroraphilealis

Summary: Phil’s been flirting with Dan for months by the time he finally comes to visit Phil in Manchester, only Phil had insisted they not make anything official between them until they’d actually met in person. Phil had been hoping that would take the pressure off of them to do anything they’d talked about on Skype, only something seems to be off about Dan. Phil just wants Dan to be comfortable, no matter what that means.

You’re Beautiful - whiskersandquiff

Summary: Dan and Phil are meeting in person for the first time, and both are nervous as hell. They spend the day together and work through the nerves to find the start of something beautiful.
trail.content:
part one, part two, part three

blog.description: Used to be Phanscuddles, then Itstooearlyfortiramisu and now mrandmrlesterhowell bc lets face it they really are married! been following phil since 2006 and dan since he first showed up in 2009, happy to answer any phan related questions, I have seen a lot of things over the years! post mainly phan things that make me happy :)
